StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateSemesterInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ID int, @NWARowId uniqueiden..er, @SemesterName varchar(50), @SemesterGPA numeric(6,2), @UserLogin uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PooleeSemesterInfo] si --inner join [MCRISS].[dbo].[NWA] n --ON si.nwa_id = n.nwa_id where ID = @ID and @ID > 0)
--n.[rowguid] = @NWARowId)
BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[PooleeSemesterInfo] SET [SemesterName] = @SemesterName, [SemesterGPA] = @SemesterGPA, [LastUpdateUserId] = newid(), [LastUpdateDate] = GetDate()
WHERE ID = @ID
-- WHERE nwa_id = (SELECT si.nwa_id FROM[MCRISS].[USMC].[PooleeSemesterInfo] si -- inner join [MCRISS].[dbo].[NWA] n -- ON si.nwa_id = n.nwa_id -- where n.[rowguid] = @NWARowId) END
ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[PooleeSemesterInfo] ([NWA_ID] ,[SemesterName] ,[SemesterGPA] , [LastUpdateUserId],[LastUpdateDate])
Select NWA_ID, @SemesterName, @SemesterGPA, newid(),GetDate()
FROM NWA n where n.rowguid = @NWARowId
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
